name: Swarm of Maggots
condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.Swarm: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny maggot. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.Infestation: Melee Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 10 (4d4) piercing damage, or 5 (2d4) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. A creature damaged by the swarm must succeed on a DC 12+1d4 + 10 Constitution saving throw or contract a disease.
